means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 赫特 Hart的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"损害，伤害"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: hurt, injure, wound, harm, damage, disable
means: hurt ： 普通用词，较口语化，侧重指给有生命的东西造成机体上或精神、感情上的或轻或重的伤害。
injure较hurt正式，多用于有生命的事物。既可指伤害别人的事物。即可指伤害别人的健康、外貌、自尊心、名誉等，又可指使别人受伤或东西受损，同时含有受伤害部分至少暂时丧失功能的意味。
wound ： 专指对身体的重伤，尤指在战斗中受的伤，强调外部创伤；也可指精神方面的伤害。
harm ： 主要用于有生命的东西，语气略强于injure，指引起严重的痛苦和损伤；有时也用于抽象事物，指造成任何不良后果。
damage ： 通常指对无生命物体的损害，并有降低其价值，破坏其功能等的后果。

sentence.Network_en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentence.Network_en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentence.Network_cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentence.Network_en: They have both behaved very badly and I am very hurt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们俩都很不友善，让我非常难过。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the senses 'to strike' and 'a blow'): from Old French hurter (verb), hurt (noun), perhaps ultimately of Germanic origin

entry.tran: 使（自己或身体某部位）受伤
entry.def: If you hurt yourself or hurt a part of your body, you feel pain because you have injured yourself.

example.ex: Yasin had seriously hurt himself while trying to escape from the police...
example.tran: 亚辛试图从警察手中逃脱时受了重伤。

example.ex: He had hurt his back in an accident.
example.tran: 他在一次事故中伤了后背。

entry.def: If a part of your body hurts, you feel pain there.

example.ex: His collar bone only hurt when he lifted his arm.
example.tran: 他的锁骨只有在抬臂时才感觉到痛。

entry.def: If you are hurt, you have been injured.

example.ex: His comrades asked him if he was hurt...
They were dazed but did not seem to be badly hurt.
example.tran: 他们有些神志不清，但看起来没有受重伤。

entry.def: If you hurt someone, you cause them to feel pain.

example.ex: I didn't mean to hurt her, only to keep her still...
example.tran: 我不是故意要弄痛她，只是想让她别乱动。

entry.def: If someone hurts you, they say or do something that makes you unhappy.

example.ex: He is afraid of hurting Bessy's feelings...
example.tran: 他怕伤害了贝茜的感情。

example.ex: She's afraid she's going to be hurt and that she'll never fall in love again...
example.tran: 她害怕自己会受到伤害，从而永远不会再恋爱了。

entry.def: If you are hurt, you are upset because of something that someone has said or done.

example.ex: He gave me a slightly hurt look.
example.tran: 他有点受伤地看了我一眼。

entry.def: If you say that you are hurting, you mean that you are experiencing emotional pain.

example.ex: I am lonely and I am hurting.

entry.tran: 危害;损害;妨碍;对…产生不良影响
entry.def: To hurt someone or something means to have a bad effect on them or prevent them from succeeding.

example.ex: The combination of hot weather and decreased water supplies is hurting many industries...
example.tran: 炎热的天气和供水的减少正危及很多行业。

example.ex: They may fear hurting their husbands' careers.
example.tran: 她们可能担心对丈夫的事业造成损害。

entry.def: A feeling of hurt is a feeling that you have when you think that you have been treated badly or judged unfairly.

example.ex: ...feelings of hurt and anger, fear and despair...
example.tran: 伤心、愤怒、恐惧、绝望的复杂情感

example.ex: I was full of jealousy and hurt...

entry.def: If you say 'It won't hurt to do something' or 'It never hurts to do something', you are recommending an action which you think is helpful or useful.

example.ex: It wouldn't hurt you to be a bit more serious.
example.tran: 认真一点对你没有坏处。

means.word_mean: 1. any physical damage to the body caused by violence or accident or fracture etc.

sentences.sentence: "the death of his wife caused him great distress"

means.word_mean: 3. feelings of mental or physical pain
5. the act of damaging something or someone
3. cause emotional anguish or make miserable;

sentences.sentence: "It pains me to see my children not being taught well in school"
"Our business was hurt by the new competition"
"She hurt me when she did not include me among her guests"

means.word_mean: 7. feel pain or be in pain
1. suffering from physical injury especially that suffered in battle;
2. used of inanimate objects or their value

auth_sentence.content: I could never forgive anyone who hurt my family.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could never forgive anyone who hurt my family.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could never forgive anyone who hurt my family.

auth_sentence.content: It doesn t hurt a child to learn things.
auth_sentence.res_content: It doesn t hurt a child to learn things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It doesn t hurt a child to learn things.

auth_sentence.content: This recipe should help, and can't hurt.
auth_sentence.res_content: This recipe should help, and can't hurt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This recipe should help, and can't hurt.

Sentence.sentence: The shift to a low-carbon economy will help some firms, hurt others and require every organisation that uses much energy to rethink how it operates.
The shift to a low-carbon economy will help some firms, hurt others and require every organisation that uses much energy to rethink how it operates.
Cheating Hurts Other, Too Cheaters often feel invisible, as if their actions "don't count" and don't really hurt anyone
He had a finger hurt last night
He had a finger hurt last night
But Bowman's supporters argue that Monsanto is trying to expand the scope of patents in ways that would enrich big corporations and hurt small farmers.

sentences.en: He hurt his leg while playing football.
I didn't hurt your pride on purpose.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意伤害你的自尊心。

sentences.en: You hurt me, loosen your hands.

means.word_mean: 使伤心，使痛心；使痛苦，使苦恼

sentences.en: You should not hurt your parents.
sentences.cn: 你不应该伤你父母的心。

sentences.en: My feet hurt when I walk.

means.word_mean: 引起疼痛，致痛；带来(精神上的)痛苦； 损伤，损害

sentences.en: Your criticism to him hurt most.
sentences.cn: 你对他的批评大大地伤害了他。

means.word_mean: 对…有害; 对…有不良影响

sentences.en: It won't hurt to postpone the matter for a few days.
sentences.cn: 此事耽搁几天无所影响。

sentences.en: I am sure smoking hurts you.
sentences.cn: 我肯定吸烟会损害你的健康。

sentences.en: No one suffered any hurt in the accident.
sentences.cn: 在这场事故中没有人受伤。

sentences.en: It was a severe hurt to her pride.
sentences.cn: 这对她的自尊心是一次严重的伤害。

sentences.en: The experience left me with a feeling of deep hurt.
sentences.cn: 这次经历给我留下了深深的创伤。

jushi.english: My feet hurt when I walk.
Her hand hurt from lugging the suitcase.
jushi.chinese: 她吃力地提着手提箱,手都提痛了。
没有比牙疼更让人难受的了。
